name: test_dns_record_relation[integration_datasets0-ActiveStatus]
description:
arrange: given deployed bind-operator
    act: integrate any-charm instances to the deployed app
    assert: bind-operator should have the correct status and respond to dig queries
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given deployed bind-operator
act: integrate any-charm instances to the deployed app
assert: bind-operator should have the correct status and respond to dig queries

parameters.name: integration_datasets
parameters.value: ([DnsEntry(domain='dns.test', host_label='admin', ttl=600, record_class=<RecordClass.IN: 'IN'>, record_type=<RecordType.A: 'A'>, record_data='42.42.42.42'), DnsEntry(domain='dns.test', host_label='admin2', ttl=600, record_class=<RecordClass.IN: 'IN'>, record_type=<RecordType.A: 'A'>, record_data='42.42.42.43'), DnsEntry(domain='dns2.test', host_label='admin', ttl=600, record_class=<RecordClass.IN: 'IN'>, record_type=<RecordType.A: 'A'>, record_data='42.42.44.44')],)
